channel.title: Suggestion
channel.description:
Dear moparcrafters,
Now with 1.1 pvp at night is turned on. For a builder like me this is a not so good update. We are working on buildings with all our building materials with us and if suddenly someone appears he kills you and gets all your stuff. I haven't got this so far but well my suggestion is that there should be some special pvp zones where people can go fight and let the others build. I know this is probably not gonna happen but why don't give it a try?
thanks for reading, halflive9

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:6, topic:433265”]I know it’s a bit annoying, but with the 10 extra lwc we were given, keep one near where you are building, when it’s about to be night time, put anything really valuable in it and only have the current block you’re using on you?

Not sure if that helps or not, but that’s what I do sometimes.[/quote]
Hmm, thanks for the idea. Will try it.
